docs.lead_paragraph: An author fighting ovarian cancer who may not have long to live has offered up her husband in a tear-jerking essay: "If you're looking for a dreamy, let's-go-for-it travel companion, Jason is your man."

headline.print_headline: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband
headline.main: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband

docs.snippet: An author fighting ovarian cancer who may not have long to live has offered up her husband in a tear-jerking essay: "If you're looking for a dreamy, let's-go-for-it travel companion, Jason is your man."...

docs.lead_paragraph: Sanford Health, one of the largest health systems in the country, is partnering with the flagship hospital of the Miami Children's Health System to sequence the genes of nearly 1,000 Latinos and Hispanics in order to better understand the health needs of the populations.

headline.print_headline: Sanford Health, Hospital Partner on Gene Sequencing Project
headline.main: Sanford Health, Hospital Partner on Gene Sequencing Project

docs.lead_paragraph: Jonas Kaufmann has canceled at the Metropolitan Opera yet again, this time nearly a year in advance.

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. appeals court on Friday ruled to lift protections that kept gray wolves an endangered species in Wyoming for years after federal officials removed packs in neighboring states from that list.

headline.print_headline: Court Rules to Lift Federal Protections for Wyoming Wolves
headline.main: Court Rules to Lift Federal Protections for Wyoming Wolves

docs.snippet: A U.S. appeals court on Friday ruled to lift protections that kept gray wolves an endangered species in Wyoming for years after federal officials removed packs in neighboring states from that list....

docs.lead_paragraph: An 88-year-old Pennsylvania woman says she talked an attacker out of raping her by lying to him that she was HIV-positive.

docs.lead_paragraph: As part of a sustained assault on the extremist group known as al-Qaida in the Arabian Peninsula, U.S. warplanes have launched more than 30 airstrikes in Yemen the past two days, a Pentagon spokesman said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon: More Than 30 Airstrikes in Yemen Since Thursday

docs.lead_paragraph: Sterling Bank <STERLNB.LG> will abandon plans to buy a rival because of the high costs of doing an acquisition and focus instead on organic growth driven by retail customers, its chief financial officer said.

headline.print_headline: Sterling Bank Drops M&A Plans for Retail-Driven Growth
headline.main: Sterling Bank Drops M&A Plans for Retail-Driven Growth

docs.lead_paragraph: A court security officer in Maine has been placed on leave while under investigation for sending a cellphone photo of a defense attorney's notes to a prosecutor.

docs.lead_paragraph: With electricity demand in Brazil slashed by the harshest recession in a century, the government is evaluating an innovative kind of power auction - to allow companies to bid for the right to cancel licenses to build plants.

headline.print_headline: With Power Demand Weak, Brazil Mulls an Auction to Cancel Projects
headline.main: With Power Demand Weak, Brazil Mulls an Auction to Cancel Projects
